articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 
tropoFarmer ∞: quick thoughts on @Coinbase_NFT:
👎 major missing/half-baked features (no trait filtering, no timed listings, no activity/sales, profile curation sucks)
👍 0% fees, clean design, comments, non-custodial/non-KYC, Discover has potential
👍👍👍 90 million registered Coinbase users

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 8/9 Will The Merge solve the high gas fees problem? ⛽
Unfortunately not ☹️
It will not have any impact on the current user experience on Ethereum, but future updates on Ethereum’s roadmap such as #sharding will help solve that issue

articles.author: DeFi Pulse 🍇
articles.description:
Re 7/9 Bitcoin vs Ethereum’s halvening 💭
📋Bitcoin:
Halves its insurance rate every 4 years
📋Ethereum:
Insurance rate will reduce 90% at the time of The Merge
The Merge is equivalent to 3 #Bitcoin halvenings happening at once
